acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on January 15, 1964.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of manuscripts and a letter from Jack London to the publisher.

did.unittitle: Synopsis of "Sea Novel" ( The Sea Wolf) with carbon copy n.d.
Amplification of synopsis of last half of sea novel. n.d.

scopecontent.p: Letter from Jack London to (Robert Underwood ?) Johnson, publisher with typed copy of same.
